layman_description: Advanced system that combines multiple items into superior results.
technical_description: Equipment with multi-item crafting and synthesis capability.
player_impact: Combine items into powerful hybrid equipment.

layman_description: System allowing unlimited customization combinations for items.
technical_description: Equipment with mod combination system and custom builds.
player_impact: Create completely custom items with any mod combinations.

layman_description: Device that converts items between different types and rarities.
technical_description: Equipment with item transmutation and rarity conversion.
player_impact: Transform any item into different item type.

layman_description: Tool for removing core essence from items for reuse.
technical_description: Equipment with essence removal and core material extraction.
player_impact: Extract essence from items to reuse in others.

layman_description: Conducts and amplifies magical or power resonances in items.
technical_description: Equipment with resonance amplification and power boost.
player_impact: Enhance magical items to many times their power.

layman_description: Adjusts items to optimal frequencies for maximum performance.
technical_description: Equipment with frequency tuning and performance optimization.
player_impact: Items work at perfect efficiency all the time.

layman_description: Sensor that prevents equipment overloading and breaking.
technical_description: Equipment with overload prevention and damage resistance.
player_impact: Items cannot be damaged or broken by overuse.

layman_description: System that predicts and prevents equipment failure.
technical_description: Equipment with failure prediction and preemptive protection.
player_impact: Equipment never breaks or fails unexpectedly.

layman_description: Program that strengthens materials at molecular level.
technical_description: Equipment with material reinforcement and durability maximum.
player_impact: All items become virtually indestructible.

layman_description: Materials that adjust properties based on usage situation.
technical_description: Equipment with dynamic property adaptation and efficiency.
player_impact: Items automatically optimize for current situation.

layman_description: Pod that evolves items into superior advanced forms.
technical_description: Equipment with item evolution and tier escalation system.
player_impact: Upgrade regular items into legendary versions.

layman_description: Portal allowing items to transcend normal limitations.
technical_description: Equipment with transcendence enabling and limitation breaking.
player_impact: Items exceed normal maximum power levels.

layman_description: Database that stores infinite versions of single item.
technical_description: Equipment with duplication and infinite storage.
player_impact: Carry infinite copies of any single item.

layman_description: Magical space that adds equipment slots to any item.
technical_description: Equipment with slot addition and capacity increase.
player_impact: Add unlimited mod slots to any equipment.

layman_description: Chemical that removes equipped item restrictions.
technical_description: Equipment with restriction removal and binding breaking.
player_impact: Equip items with normally conflicting effects together.

layman_description: System that multiplies effect interactions between items.
technical_description: Equipment with synergy detection and cascade multiplication.
player_impact: Item combinations provide exponential power boosts.

layman_description: Device that prevents harmful effect loops from happening.
technical_description: Equipment with feedback mitigation and safety control.
player_impact: Use powerful items without dangerous feedback loops.

layman_description: Buffer that safely handles excess effects and resources.
technical_description: Equipment with overflow handling and resource banking.
player_impact: Excess effects and resources get stored for later.

layman_description: Algorithm that maximizes damage and effect scaling properly.
technical_description: Equipment with scaling optimization and damage calculation.
player_impact: Damage and effects scale optimally with stats.

layman_description: Device ensuring all bonuses and penalties balance perfectly.
technical_description: Equipment with automatic balancing and offset negation.
player_impact: Never suffer penalties while enjoying all bonuses.
